mapper.select: select keyword from tag where type = #{ type }
select galleryno, location, galleryname, detailaddress, nvl(tel, '-') as tel from Gallery where galleryname != '-' order by location, galleryname
select distinct location from gallery where location != '-' order by location

select galleryno, location, galleryname, detailaddress, nvl(tel, '-') as tel from Gallery where galleryname != '-'
and galleryname like '%' || #{ searchWord } || '%' or detailaddress like '%' || #{ searchWord } || '%'
and location = #{ galleryLocation } and galleryname like '%' || #{ searchWord } || '%'
order by location, galleryname
mapper.insert: insert into appliedexhibits ( applyingno, fk_galleryno, exhibitionname, applier, author, startdate, enddate, email, tel, genre, tag, authorinfo, exhibitioninfo, price, foodordrink, extrarestriction, photo, openclosetime ) values ( to_number( #{ applyingno } ), to_number( #{ fk_galleryno } ), #{ exhibitionname }, #{ applier }, #{ author }, #{ startdate }, #{ enddate }, #{ email }, #{ tel }, #{ genre }, #{ tag }, #{ authorinfo }, #{ exhibitioninfo }, to_number( #{ price } ), #{ foodordrink }, #{ extrarestriction }, #{ photo }, #{ openclosetime } )

insert into appliedDetail(appliedimgseq, fk_applyingno, imagefilename, imageorgfilename, imagefilesize , imageinfo, thumbnailfilename, mainposter) values( seq_appliedDetail.nextval, #{ fk_applyingno }, #{ imagefilename }, #{ imageorgfilename } , #{ imagefilesize }, #{ imageinfo }, #{ thumbnailfilename }, #{ mainposter } )
mapper.select: select exhibitionno, exhibitionname, author, status from exhibition where status = '전시중'

select E.exhibitionno, E.exhibitionname, E.author, E.status, G.galleryname , E.applier, E.tel, E.email, E.startdate, E.enddate, E.genre, E.tag , E.exhibitioninfo, E.price, E.foodordrink, E.extrarestriction, E.photo, E.openclosetime , nvl(ED.mainposter, '없음') AS mainposter , nvl(ED.image1, '없음') AS image1, nvl(ED.image2, '없음') AS image2, nvl(ED.image3, '없음') AS image3 , nvl(ED.image1info, '없음') AS image1info, nvl(ED.image2info, '없음') AS image2info, nvl(ED.image3info, '없음') AS image3info from exhibition E JOIN gallery G on E.fk_galleryno = G.galleryno JOIN exhibitiondetail ED on E.exhibitionno = ED.fk_exhibitionno where E.exhibitionno = #{ no }
select exhibitionno, exhibitionname, author, status from exhibition where status = '전시예정'
mapper.update: update exhibition set status = '전시중' where exhibitionno = #{ exhibitionno }
mapper.select: select exhibitionno, exhibitionname, author, status from exhibition where status = '전시종료'
select applyingno, exhibitionname, author from appliedexhibits

select AE.applyingno, AE.exhibitionname, AE.author, G.galleryname , AE.applier, AE.tel, AE.email, AE.startdate, AE.enddate, AE.genre, AE.tag , AE.exhibitioninfo, AE.price, AE.foodordrink, AE.extrarestriction, AE.photo, AE.openclosetime from appliedExhibits AE JOIN gallery G on AE.fk_galleryno = G.galleryno where AE.applyingno = #{ no }

select fk_applyingno, imagefilename, imageorgfilename, imagefilesize, thumbnailfilename, mainposter , nvl(image1info, '없음') AS image1info, nvl(image2info, '없음') AS image2info, nvl(image3info, '없음') AS image3info from appliedDetail where fk_applyingno = #{ no } order by fk_applyingno desc
